pages.title: Motor_Details
pages.text: Smart Object content  This smart object provides a symbol representing a motor. When clicking on this symbol while runtime a screen showing details is poping up.    Mode can be switched between manual and automatic  Command buttons to start and stop the motor in manual mode  Speed setpoint can be set in manual mode  Speed setpoint in automatic mode from any mapped variable  Adjustable speed ramp for up and down, can be disabled  Motor can run in positive and negative direction  Actual value options for current, power and torque, can be disabled  Adjustable warnings and alarms for actual values  Simulation mode for testing including some noise for actual values  Trend and gant screens   Alarm screen   Chronological event list screen  Prerequisites  To use this smart object it is mandatory to have smart object template Motor_LoadAll (Version 2) imported and referenced as Motor_Global. If not the zenonLogic project LoadParameter will not compile and you can not make use of parameter loading to multiple motors.

pages.title: Smart Object - Engineering Content
pages.text: zenon screens  Name  Screen type  Frame  Description  CD_Motor_Basic  Standard  Internal ID: Motor - Content  Standard  Displays the screen type used in principle for the screen. If screens with special properties are required, special screen types appropriate for the requirements can be selected.  More in the online help.  CD_Container_Standard  Basic screen to operate the motor  Name  Screen type  Frame  Description  CD_Motor_FBD  Standard  CD_Container_Details  Details screen in function block diagram design.  Name  Screen type  Frame  Description  CD_Motor_Gant  Extended Trend  Internal ID: Motor - Content  Extended Trend  Displays online values and archive values as line graphics in Service Engine.  More in the online help.  CD_Container_Standard  Displays a gant chart containing  Fault (Motor not ready)  Enable (Enable Motor)  Simulation  Mode (Manual / Automatic)  State  Name  Screen type  Frame  Description  CD_Motor_Trend  Extended Trend  CD_Container_Details  Displays a trend screen.  Name  Screen type  Frame  Description  CD_Motor_Parameters  Standard  CD_Container_Extended  Motor parameter can be set here.  Name  Screen type  Frame  Description  CD_Motor_Simulation  Standard  CD_Container_Extended  Simulation can be enabled and disabled here. Also simulation parameter will be set here.  Symbols  Symbol  Description  Motor_Details_Motor  Symbol for a simple motor to drag and drop it to a project screen. Once you click on this symbol the screen CD_Motor_Basic pops up.  Symbol  Description  Motor_Details_Motor_Controller  Motor symbol including analog motor data to drag and drop it to a project screen. Once you click on this symbol the screen CD_Motor_Basic pops up.  Symbol  Description  Motor_Details_Speed_Display  Motor Speed indicator as a bargraph and as a value above. This symbol displays only positive values (rotating one direction only).  Symbol  Description  Motor_Details_Speed_Display_two_Directions  Motor Speed indicator as a bargraph and as a value above. This symbol displays positive and negative values (rotating both directions).  Symbol  Description  Motor_Details_Checkbox_Selected_Device  Provides a checkbox used to select device for parameter loading with SOT Motor_LoadAll.  Released properties - General  Property  Description  Label  Name of the motor that is displayed on the header of the popup screens and next to the motor symbol itself.  Released properties - Authorization  Permission level for operations.  Property  Description  Change parameter  Authorization level to change parameter.  Change simulation parameter  Authorization level to enable / disable simulation mode and set simulation parameter.  Change mode  Authorization level for switching between manual and automatic operation mode.  Access details  Permission to navigate to details screen.  Access diagnosis  Permission to navigate to diagnosis screen.  Released properties - Units  Property  Description  Speed  Unit of speed (default: rpm)  Speed Ramp  Unit of speed ramp (default: rpm/s)  Power  Unit of motor power (default: kW)  Released properties - Digits after comma  Property  Description  Speed  Digits after comma displayed for speed values.  Speed Ramp  Digits after comma displayed for speed ramp values.  Current  Digits after comma displayed for current values.  Power  Digits after comma displayed for power values.  Torque  Digits after comma displayed for torque values.  Released properties - Bargraph ranges  Property  Description  Speed Max  Bargraph Scale Maximum of Actual Speed.  Speed Max Negative Direction  Bargraph Scale Maximum of Actual Speed when Motor running in negative direction.  Current Max  Bargraph Scale Maximum of Actual electrical current.  Power Max  Bargraph Scale Maximum of Actual motor power.  Torque Max  Bargraph Scale Maximum of Actual motor torque.  Released properties - State colors  Colors indicating each motor state (for motor symbol fill color and gant chart)  Property  Description  Init  Initialization  Error  Any error active  Stop  Motor Off  Ramping Up  Motor started - speed setpoint ramping up  Ramping Down  Motor stop requested but still running - speed setpoint ramping down  Running  Motor running  Released properties - Enable output colors  Colors for indicators of motor enable output.  Property  Description  Enable output off  Output to enable the motor off (color used in CD_basic screen and gant chart)  Enable output on  Output to enable the motor on  Released properties - Mode colors  Property  Description  Manual  Motor in manual operation mode (color used at gant chart)  Automatic  Motor in automatic operation mode  Released properties - Simulation mode colors  Property  Description  Off  Simulation mode off (color used at gant chart)  On  Simulation mode on

pages.title: Additional Content
pages.text: Variables  Name  IEC data type  Driver  Description  Cmd_Reset  BOOL  Intern  Command to reset State when in Error state.  Command_Manual  INT  Intern  Command to start and stop the motor in manual mode and simulation (SOT internal use, not interchangeable).  Command_Automatic  INT  Intern  Command to start and stop the motor in automatic mode.  Enable_Motor  BOOL  Intern  Output to enable the motor.  Motor_Fault  BOOL  Intern  Feedback from motor controller that motor has no fault.  FALSE: Motor faulty  TRUE: Motor no fault (ready)  Start_Interlock  BOOL  Intern  Start Interlock (Disabled while in Simulation Mode)  Error_Reason  INT  Intern  Error Reason why state has changed to Error state  Mode  INT  Intern  Manual or automatic mode.  Simulation  BOOL  Intern  Simulation enabled or disabled.  Simulation_Enable_Noise  BOOL  Intern  Enables the simulation of some noise for actual values.  State  INT  Intern  Motor state  1: Init  10: Off  20: Ramping Up  30: Ramping Down  40: Running  1000: Error  Manual_Speed_Set  REAL  Intern  Speed setpoint in manual mode.  Auto_Speed_Set  REAL  Intern  Speed setpoint in automatic mode.  Speed_Set_Max_Pos  REAL  Intern  Speed setpoint limit in positive direction.  Speed_Set_Max_Neg  REAL  Intern  Speed setpoint limit in negative direction.  Speed_Alarms_Delay_Set  REAL  Intern  Alarm Delay Setpoint for Speed Deviation Alarms and Warnings.  Speed_Alarm  INT  Intern  Internal Variable for Alarmhandling.  Enable_Speed_Ramping  REAL  Intern  Enable the speed setpoint ramping functionality, if this is off ramped setpoint follows setpoint directly.  Ramp_Up_Speed_Set  REAL  Intern  Ramping speed for acceleration.  Ramp_Down_Speed_Set  REAL  Intern  Ramping speed for deceleration.  Speed_Set_Ramped  REAL  Intern  Ramped speed setpoint.  Speed_Act  REAL  Intern  Actual speed value (map this variable to a variable that holds the actual speed).  Speed_Deviation_Warning  REAL  Intern  If the difference between ramped speed setpoint and actual speed is higher than this value a warning will be triggered.  Speed_Deviation_Alarm  REAL  Intern  If the difference beteween ramped speed setpoint and actual speed is higher than this value an alarm will be triggered.  Enable_Speed_Alarms  BOOL  Intern  Enable Speed Deviation Alarms and Warnings.  Speed_Standstill  REAL  Intern  When ramping down the actual speed value needs to be lower this value to consider motor as off.  Enable_Current  BOOL  Intern  Enables the electrical current measurement.  Current_Act  REAL  Intern  Actual value of electrical current.  Current_Maximum_Warning  REAL  Intern  Trigger level current maximum warning.  Current_Maximum_Alarm  REAL  Intern  Trigger level current maximum alarm.  Current_Alarms_Delay_Set  REAL  Intern  Alarm Delay Setpoint for Current Alarms and Warnings.  Current_Alarm  INT  Intern  Internal Variable for Alarmhandling.  Enable_Current_Alarms  BOOL  Intern  Enable Current Alarms and Warnings.  Enable_Power  BOOL  Intern  Enables the electrical power measurement.  Power_Act  REAL  Intern  Actual value of electrical power.  Power_Maximum_Warning  REAL  Intern  Trigger level power maximum warning.  Power_Maximum_Alarm  REAL  Intern  Trigger level power maximum alarm.  Power_Alarms_Delay_Set  REAL  Intern  Alarm Delay Setpoint for Power Alarms and Warnings.  Power_Alarm  INT  Intern  Internal Variable for Alarmhandling.  Enable_Power_Alarms  BOOL  Intern  Enable Power Alarms and Warnings.  Enable_Torque  BOOL  Intern  Enables the torque measurement.  Torque_Act  REAL  Intern  Actual value of torque.  Torque_Maximum_Warning  REAL  Intern  Trigger level torque maximum warning.  Torque_Maximum_Alarm  REAL  Intern  Trigger level torque maximum alarm.  Torque_Alarms_Delay_Set  REAL  Intern  Alarm Delay Setpoint for Torque Alarms and Warnings.  Torque_Alarm  INT  Intern  Internal Variable for Alarmhandling.  Enable_Torque_Alarms  BOOL  Intern  Enable Torque Alarms and Warnings.  Motor_Running_Negative_Direction  BOOL  Intern  Motor running direction (SO internal flag to show the correct bargraph).  ISA_Command_Start  BOOL  Intern  ISA Command to start the motor.  ISA_Command_Stop  BOOL  Intern  ISA Command to stop the motor.  Cnf_Show_Details  BOOL  Intern  Display or hide label text next to the motor symbol. Map this Variable to *Show_Details of Variable created by reference of SOT Show_Details.  Request_For_Selection_LoadParameter  BOOL  Intern  Once this Variable is set a checkbox next to the symbol will be visible to select parameter loading.  Select_To_LoadParameter  BOOL  Intern  Parameter loading selected for this device.  Running  BOOL  Intern  Internal Variable used for ALC.  Reaction Matrix  Name  Description  CD_Error_Reason  Alarm Reason  0: No Error  1000: Motor controller fault  CD_Speed_Deviation_Alarms  0: No Alarm  10: Actual Speed Low Warning  20: Actual Speed Low Alarm  30: Actual Speed High Warning  40: Actual Speed High Alarm  CD_Current_Alarms  0: No Alarm  10: Actual Current High Warning  20: Actual Current High Alarm  CD_Power_Alarms  0: No Alarm  10: Actual Power High Warning  20: Actual Power High Alarm  CD_Torque_Alarms  0: No Alarm  10: Actual Torque High Warning  20: Actual Torque High Alarm  Drivers  Drivers  Description  Intern  Internal variables  Functions  Function  zenon functions  Description  CD_scriptExecute_popup_Supervisor  Script: execute  Internal ID: Additional content  Script: execute  This function executes a selected script.  More in the online help.  Executes script to switch to Diagnosis view.  CD_scrSwitch_popup_Diagnosis  Screen switch  Internal ID: Additional content  Screen switch  This function opens a selected screen. Optionally, a dialog for the user can be opened before that.  More in the online help.  Used in above script.  CD_varWrite_Mode_Automatic  Write/modify set value  Internal ID: Additional content  Write/modify set value  This function sends a new value for a selected variable to the PLC.  More in the online help.  Sets the motor operation mode to automatic.  CD_varWrite_Mode_Manual  Write/modify set value  Sets the motor operation mode to manual.  CD_varWrite_Commandn_Start  Write/modify set value  Sets the variable Command to 1 to start the motor.  CD_varWrite_Commandn_Stop  Write/modify set value  Sets the variable Command to 2 to stop the motor.  CD_varWrite_Enable_Current  Write/modify set value  Toggles the variable Enable_Current to enable/disable the current measurement.  CD_varWrite_Enable_Power  Write/modify set value  Toggles the variable Enable_Power to enable/disable the power measurement.  CD_varWrite_Enable_Torque  Write/modify set value  Toggles the variable Enable_Torque to enable/disable the torque measurement.  CD_varWrite_Enable_Speed_Ramping  Write/modify set value  Toggles the variable Enable_Speed_Ramping to enable/disable the speed setpoint ramping functionality.  CD_varWrite_Enable_Simulation_Noise  Write/modify set value  Toggles the variable Simulation_Enable_Noise to enable/disable the simulation of some noise to actual values.  CD_varWrite_Speed_Current_Alarms  Write/modify set value  Toggles the variable Enable_Speed_Alarms to enable/disable the speed deviation alarming.  CD_varWrite_Enable_Current_Alarms  Write/modify set value  Toggles the variable Enable_Current_Alarms to enable/disable the current alarming.  CD_varWrite_Enable_Power_Alarms  Write/modify set value  Toggles the variable Enable_Power_Alarms to enable/disable the power alarming.  CD_varWrite_Enable_Torque_Alarms  Write/modify set value  Toggles the variable Enable_Torque_Alarms to enable/disable the torque alarming.  Nested smart objects  SOT name  Reference name  Description  Generic_Device  Generic  Contains screen containers, navigation buttons and symbols. All what is the same for any device.
